passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > main:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h4
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > ins > div > iframe
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(4) > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > h6:nth-child(2)

any.message: Heading order valid
